name: Scorched Earth: The Mother of All Games
name_original: Scorched Earth: The Mother of All Games
description:
Scorched Earth: The Mother of All Games is a strategy game developed by Wendell Hicken. It came out on 01-01-1991. It was published by Wendell Hicken. The game is rated as "Recommended" on RAWG.
Scorched Earth: The Mother of All Games is available on PC.
